Description.Text: Sultanahmet Cesme Hotel is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Istanbul. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and parking, a rooftop terrace and a good location close to the Blue Mosque. Sultanahmet is the oldest part of city. Bordered by the waters of the Sea of Marmara and the Bosphorus, it is home to several of Istanbul's most famous and beautiful historic structures. Nearby places of interest include the stunning 6th-century Hagia Sophia, the Blue Mosque and the majestic Sultan Ahmet Square, which contains many monuments and statues and the ruins of the Hippodrome of Constantinople. Cemberlitas tram stop is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Istanbul destinations. The hotel was built in 2010 in a traditional style and features a lightly decorative facade with white detailing. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with contrasting light and dark tones, parquet flooring and contemporary furniture design. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a mini-bar, work desk, safe, tea and coffee equipment and an en-suite bathroom. In warmer months, guests are able to enjoy a relaxing drink and stunning views of the Sea of Marmara from the rooftop terrace. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
